p: It is vital to explore the pharmacokinetic profile of a molecule to be eligible as an active drug in clinical trial. The druggability of screened molecules were investigated for ADME properties using Swiss ADME software (Daina et al., 2017). Three pharmacokinetic parameters (Lipophilicity, solubility and bioavailability) were considered for the purpose of handling and formulation. Lipophilicity (Log P) calculations were based on XLOGP3 model (Cheng et al., 2007) and solubility calculation was based on ESOL model (Delaney, 2004), while bioavailability scores were based on the method developed by Martin ( 2005).
